materials.raw_text:
B: 80 g (Boron) 
 Cd: 50 g (Cadmium) 
 Ni: 240 g (Nickel) 
 Sc: 30 g (Scandium) 
 Tm: 10 g (Thulium)

preparation.raw_text:
1. Wear appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE). 
 2. Weigh each ingredient accurately using an analytical balance. 
 3. In a clean, dry mixing container, add the weighed Boron and Cadmium. 
 4. Gradually add Nickel while stirring continuously to ensure an even blend. 
 5. Incorporate Scandium and Thulium into the mixture, ensuring uniform distribution.
